NYC CHOREOGRAPHER'S FORUM 2019!

THE CENTER AT WEST PARK, Saturday, 2/16

NYC CHOREOGRAPHER'S FORUM
THE CENTER AT WEST PARK
Saturday, 2/16 7:30pm
165 West 86th Street
New York, NY 10024


INFO

For more info, email info@nycchoreographersforum.com.

TICKETS

An evening showcasing NYC choreographers, all styles! Tickets are $20 in advance and $30 at the door. Presented by Caston-Clark Productions.


SUBMISSIONS

If you'd like to submit your work, please submit your name, email address, title of project, and video of what you would like to present.
